page.title: 05Industry in Wilton
page.content: Industry in Wilton is prosperous. There are industries such as the{Wilton Agricultural Centre,}the {felt mill}and the world famous{Royal {Wilton Carpet Factory. The carpet factory was built in the year 1650 and has been in continuous use ever since. Youghal company now owns the factory. Two types of carpet are produced;Axminster and Wilton. The carpets are exported to the Middle East, U.S.A.,Europe and Scandinavia. At this time France is the best market. Some two million square metres of carpet are produced in a year. Sales are lower at this time and workers have been made redundant. There are thirty six head weavers. Carpet seconds are sold in the Weavers Shop and there is a museum of Wilton carpet making.
